TopicTitle: I don't see the truster beams during EVA anymore

Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.25 Windows 32bit

Problem: I don't see the the thruster beams anymore when I am playing as my kerbal in EVA using R, I can just normally use it but these thruster beams which come out of the backpack are not there anymore, really weird, I don't know which mod causes this.

Example of the beams I mean: http://aplusphysics.com/projects/images/KSPimage11.jpg

The white "beams" (don't really know any other word)

Mods installed:

DeadlyReentry_v6.3.1.beta

EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements-7-4-LR

Fine_Print-0.59

KAS_0.4.9

Legacy Parts Pack v2.0 (only the command pod)

LH_CircularPanel_v4.0

MechJeb2-2.4.0.0

RasterPropMonitor 0.18.3

RealChute_Parachute_Systems-1.2.6

SCANsat-v8.0

StageRecovery-1.5.1

TextureReplacer-1.9.2 (only for a new skybox)

AIES_Aerospace151 (I had the issue already before installing this mod)

Reproduction steps:

Doesn't matter where I am, if I go EVA with my kerbal I don't see any thruster beams when using R to move.

Log:

http://www./view/eg8w1gbu135i5c0/output_log.txt

Edited November 22, 2014 by onlinegamesz
I would say EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements-7-4-LR is what is causing this. Try removing it?
